subject: Business
title: Why Most Startups Fail
description: A fast breakdown of Why Most Startups Fail for builders.

hook.text: Nine out of ten startups fail. But the top reason isn't money, competition, or timing.

buildup.text: CB Insights studied 101 failed startups. The number-one cause: no market need.

discovery.text: Founders fall in love with their solution and skip asking if anyone has the problem.

twist.text: Even well-funded startups die this way. Quibi raised $1.75 billion and shut down in six months.

climax.text: The pattern is always the same: build first, ask later, then discover nobody cares.

punchline.text: Don't build it and hope. Ask first, then build.

quiz.question: What is the #1 reason startups fail according to CB Insights?
